cards.title: Dropped Frame
body: When this card enters play, deal each non-chat target 1 Lightning damage.
At the start of the Environment turn, each target regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Spam Bot
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the second highest HP {H - 1} psychic damage.

cards.title: Modder
body: At the start of the environment turn, put the top card of the villain deck into play.
Then, put the top card of each hero deck into play in turn order. If a limited card already in play would be put into play, discard that card instead.
cards.flavorText: Check out my new hero deck!
